name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 4
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Visual Studio Code Extension 1.0.0 Release
posts.description: With the latest release of the Visual Studio code extension from 0.3.4 to 1.0.0 we removed the preview tag and moved to a stable version.

posts.name: Aurelia RealWorld App
posts.description: Thanks to the fantastic work of Moritz Hilberg and other community members, Aurelia is now available as part of the RealWorld project [https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld]. Here's Moritz to tell you more about it...

posts.name: Aurelia 2018 Q1 Report
posts.description: With the first quarter of 2018 now behind us, we wanted to take the time to provide an update on the progress the Aurelia team and community have made towards our 2018 roadmap goals [blog/2018/01/03/aurelia-2018-roadmap].

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Late March 2018
posts.description: We're excited to share that we've recently published a new version of the Aurelia CLI which is packed with bug fixes and new features.

posts.name: Practical App Development with Aurelia
posts.description: This week we welcome Matt Duffield to tell us about his new Aurelia book!

posts.name: Building Office 365/SharePoint Applications with Aurelia
posts.description: This week, please welcome community member Magnus Danielson to share a little bit about Aurelia and Office 365. Take it away Magnus!

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early March 2018
posts.description: Last week we announced official support for Server-Side Rendering in Aurelia [blog/2018/02/25/server-side-rendering]. This week we're announcing an update to our Webpack tooling to support Webpack 4.0! We've also got a number of incremental fixes and small new features for other Aurelia libraries, detailed below.
